caption: They have an outside seating area on the 2nd floor of the Padre Hotel. There are heat lamps & a fireplace feature so you can stay warm. The bartenders can be seen making drinks at the bar. Friendly staff.  It's nice to be able to go & sit …
My favorite place for tasty american food. Got there near seven, it wasn't very crowded. The place has a cool atmosphere.
One of my favorite places for quality american food. It's so delicious. The staff was very friendly and attentive. It has an awesome feel to it. I see why this place has a lot of positive reviews.
This spot is great! Convenient rates, big dishes and the staff members are regularly kind.
Overrated.
Great atmosphere and very attentive service. The menu was crisp and delightful. Will definitely recommend this place to my friends. Affordable rates and large meals. Great work.
Awesome and delicious food, I loved the mood the place has, and the employees were very kind. Will surely come back again.

This site is my number one place.  Of all restaurants I know I prefere it most. I never miss an opportunity to go to that place. when  I I need a proper supper, this place comes straight to my head. good and all kinds of  food and a rich …
Tried this spot before with a friend and I am addicted ever since. I enjoyed the great character and tasty dishes and beverages. Highly recommended.
Elegant dining, wonderful meals and super fantastic service,,, yes, it's that good.
Nice atmosphere and good drinks
Limited menu and overpriced
(Translated by Google) My delicious salad and excellent service  (Original) Mi ensalada deliciosa y el servicio excelente
The best restaurant in Bakersfield. Service and food rival the best in the big cities.
Fantastic Food, lovely service
Really good Drinks and good food!
Great food
Excellent food nd great service. One of the best restaurants that I've ever been to.
I have been here a few times and it was good everytime. For such a nice restuarant I am kinda suprised there isnt a dress code. Nothing to strict.

I originally came after a stressful day of work on Friday and left after being ignored for a half hour. I sent an email complaining that they ignored a single diner on a slow time period for busier tables and thought nothing of it. Imagine …
American food and the atmosphere at this spot is very good. Certainly worth a return visit. The prices are good for what you get. I can see why they have a lot of good reviews.
One of my favorite places for delicious american food. I often meet people here to talk. I can see why they have so many great reviews.
american food... so delicious. They have a lot of great reviews for a reason.
One of my fav locations for delicious American food. Super delicious. Really nothing but good experiences here. Prices are appropriate.
No more buffet brunch drove 3hrs one way to go. 1 star is even too much.. update your website!!!
We had a great dinner with good friends  tonight,  and we had the privilege of being served by an awesome waiter named Justin, thank you Justin, I give an A+

Wow!  Steak was great.  The lamb was so tasty.  The scallops were unbelievable.  Our server, Charles, was so on point with wine recommendations and explained all the food options, we will definitely be back.
Food and service was excellent
Not a place for vegans.

Came in for Easter brunch today and had a wonderful experience! The entire lobby had different stations of frequently replenished hot and cold items. I really liked how the meat, cheese, and omelette station had servers there to help. The Easter treats at the dessert table were the perfect way to finish off the meal.
nice menu selection.great food .
Truffle fries, Tenderloin and dessert we're absolutely delicious! Dinner was great! Thank you.

Memories are always made here. Prairie 🔥 is a great spot like no other in town.

Had a group of 8 tonight. Everyone got served, except me. "Mishap" in the kitchen I am told. Service was very slow. Very nice young man but didn't get it. Pricey place for bad service. Go somewhere else.
A top place for american food. Nothing but pleasant experiences here. The bill was decent for the quality.
Never ate here
american food, yeah, my preferred treat. came here on a saturday. it has a great interior.
american food, mmm, yummy. This place will surprise you. The staff was very sociable and kind. Bring your appetite because portions are filling.
News Years Eve dinner was nice.
Possibly the best fine dining experience in Bakersfield. Fantastic staff. Outstanding wine selection. The menu is always a delight.
Great food. Steaks particularly good.
FrigginRiggin says hi.
Great atmosphere for fine dining
Good food great service

Wonderful birthday dinner that was topped off with birthday creme brulee!!! Absolutely delicious. The corn succotash and lobster mac and cheese were so good. I highly recommend this restaurant if you're in the Balersfield area.
Worst food ever save your money and go to the Mark.

Perfect moms night out! We made reservations for dessert and drinks. We ordered six desserts and four different coffee beverages. I recommend the oreo cheesecake and an americano. Our server was fantastic! It was the perfect night of elegance, indulgence  and relaxation.
Very well worth the price. Server was nice and polite. I would definitely go back for more. Best restaurant experience in Bakersfield.
Every experience has been great.  Everything to die for.  The duck, the steaks.  The bread is great too!  Sometimes food arrival can take awhile.  Very accommodating and knowledgable waiters.
Very upscale atmosphere. Amazing food, food quality ingredients. On the pricey side, but worth it for a special occasion.
Overpriced and undercooked. That's all you need to know.

I had a barbecue bacon Burger with fries it was excellent very much so everything I expected it to be-and look like was very hungry when I came into the hotel from a 5 hour drive so I'm very satisfied
Nicest place in Bakersfield...so far
Fabulous experience from the minute we walked in. Definitely one of the finest dining experiences of our lives.
"Great food & service, can't say enough about this place." "Your employees just don't pay attention."
Fantastic service!
We went for the Sunday champagne brunch.  VERY good variety and food. Excellent attention from the wait staff. Will become a habit of mine.

Really fight giving this place five stars.  That's a good thing.   It was close.   Great customer service experience too!
Ahhite. Nothing special

Good food but always too slow and inconsistent service.
